name: Caryatid Column
resistance: piercing and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren’t adamantine
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The caryatid column is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The caryatid column has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The caryatid column’s weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Shatter Weapons
traits.desc: Whenever a character strikes a caryatid column with a non-adamantine, nonmagical weapon, the character must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or the weapon shatters into pieces.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.
